data.text: @weareoversight So much info. You're doing the heavy lifting @weareoversight  Thank you for the updates.
@weareoversight Oh look! DeSantis was a Covid a**hole from the beginning. Shocker. https://t.co/Aw20A35klw

@weareoversight Thank you for this. Only got through part of March 2020 and this (unrelated) jumped out at me: DNA testing of migrants at border to determine parent-child relationship (which has shoddy success rate resulting in even more parent-child separations). https://t.co/ba7JyHIGsr
You can read more of what we’ve uncovered regarding the response to the Covid-19 pandemic here: https://t.co/80z409sWNl

Drawing from dozens of records obtained over the past two years, we’ve published a timeline of Trump administration communications with the private sector during the first year of the Covid-19 pandemic.
https://t.co/6BmvLPlMwX

We also received records that showed BOP missed key early opportunities to mitigate Covid-19’s spread within its facilities. The documents also suggested that Covid-19 cases among incarcerated people may have been present earlier than publicly reported.
https://t.co/jiTBBfatM7 https://t.co/IjAt9cSsQ6
